Navigate Select
Add New Category

Categories are over-arching entities that can contain multiple expenses. Each category can have multiple expenses however, each expense can only have one Category. This is known as a many-to-one relationship.

Please enter the following details to create a new Category:

Add New Expense

Expenses are singular entities that can only have one category. Each expense can have a single category however, each category have multiple one expenses. This is known as a one-to-many relationship.

Please enter the following details to create a new Expense:

Note: once an expense has been created, the category can not be changed.
